TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpResponseWrapper extends System.Web.HttpResponseBase

summary.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that provides HTTP-response information from an ASP.NET operation.

span.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that provides HTTP-response information from an ASP.NET operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別，並做為包裝函式類別。The class derives from the class and serves as a wrapper for the class. 這個類別會公開的功能類別也公開時型別。This class exposes the functionality of the class while also exposing the type. 類別可讓您取代的原始實作並用自訂的實作，例如，當您執行單元測試的 ASP.NET 管線外的應用程式中的類別。The class enables you to replace the original implementation of the class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果基礎物件支援非同步清除作業，從非同步模組事件或非同步處理常式會呼叫這個方法會以非同步方式執行清除作業。If the underlying object supports asynchronous flush operations and this method is called from an asynchronous module event or from an asynchronous handler, the flush operation is performed asynchronously. 否則，會以同步方式執行排清作業。Otherwise, the flush operation is performed synchronously. IIS 6.0 和更新版本支援非同步清除。Asynchronous flush is supported for IIS 6.0 and later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks PushPromise 不具決定性，而且應用程式不應該擁有邏輯取決於它。PushPromise is non-deterministic and applications shouldn't have logic that depends on it. 其唯一目的是在某些情況下的效能優勢。Its only purpose is performance advantage in some cases. 有可能會導致完全忽略推播要求的許多情況 （通訊協定和實作）。There are many conditions (protocol and implementation) that may cause to ignore the push requests completely. 預期為基礎和不理 」。The expectation is based on fire-and-forget.
